005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapKey;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.Collection;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Map;
024import java.util.Set;
025import java.util.stream.Collectors;
026
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
028
029/**
030 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
031 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-remove">map:remove</a>
032 * function.
033 */
034public final class MapRemove {
035  private static final String NAME = "remove";
036  @NonNull
037  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
038      .name(NAME)
039      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
040      .deterministic()
041      .contextIndependent()
042      .focusIndependent()
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("map")
045          .type(IMapItem.type())
046          .one()
047          .build())
048      .argument(IArgument.builder()
049          .name("keys")
050          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
051          .zeroOrMore()
052          .build())
053      .returnType(IMapItem.type())
054      .returnOne()
055      .functionHandler(MapRemove::execute)
056      .build();
057
058  private MapRemove() {
059    // disable construction
060  }
061
062  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
063  @NonNull
064  private static <V extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
065      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
066      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
067      IItem focus) {
068    IMapItem<V> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
069    ISequence<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> keys = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
070
071    return ISequence.of(removeItems(map, keys));
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
076   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-remove">map:remove</a>.
077   *
078   * @param <V>
079   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
080   * @param map
081   *          the map of Metapath items that is to be modified
082   * @param keys
083   *          the keys to remove from the map
084   * @return the modified map
085   */
086  @NonNull
087  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> IMapItem<V> removeItems(
088      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
089      @NonNull Collection<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> keys) {
090    Set<IMapKey> keySet = keys.stream()
091        .map(IAnyAtomicItem::asMapKey)
092        .collect(Collectors.toSet());
093
094    Map<IMapKey, V> remaining = ObjectUtils.notNull(map.entrySet().stream()
095        .filter(entry -> !keySet.contains(entry.getKey()))
096        .collect(Collectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue)));
097
098    return IMapItem.ofCollection(remaining);
099  }
100}
